I frequently shop on Amazon, and when something doesn't meet my expectations, I return it, but I've never left a review. This is the first review I'm writing because other reviews mentioned that the material is good, soft, and has a nice feel, which I believe is far from the truth. I hope to leave an honest review to help those considering purchasing this jacket. I was excited when I received the clothing because it was packed in a vacuum-sealed bag, which is usually a sign of high-quality garments. However, as soon as I opened it, I knew something was wrong. A strong unpleasant odor hit me immediately, and the entire jacket was made of artificial fleece material with a very poor texture. It is definitely not the 'Wool Blend' that the product claimed. Although the design is actually quite nice, but the inferior quality of the material is simply unacceptable.

This varsity jacket is very nice and warm and very appealing. It is very well-made very stitch together, and the material is of high-quality. It is very high quality material and very well put together.

The jacket was better quality than I expected it to be. Great transitional jacket for the autumn to winter seasons. I'm  5'3"  F and 170lbs and the M gives an oversized look. This jacket will for sure be a staple for me this cold season.

评论概述: Keeps you warm and very lightweight
评论详情: When it’s not all that cold and I want something lightweight to put on this jacket does the job. The material is wool which is very warm material it doesn’t look cheap. It fits as expected and it has a Letter B design on it that’s why it’s called a letterman jacket. The price wasn’t bad and it’s keeps you warm so I highly recommend it.
I love this jacket! It’s a perfect fit. I am going to purchase more!

I ordered this for my 12 year old son in the color red and size medium. He loves the look of it. The fit is good, the arms are a bit long for him. The colors are bright and it looks well made. The snaps are a bit hard to use. We live in the desert and this will be a winter coat for him. This retro look is a favorite of mine and looks good on him. I was surprise to find this type of jacket around the mall. It seems that they are back in style.
The jacket is really good quality. The fabric is high quality. It is soft and lightweight. The color combination and style are also pretty awesome. I like it personally.

评论概述: A little on the big side but I can work with it
评论详情: Cute jacket for men or women. Sporty. The material is decent. Not to the level of a real sportsmans jacket, but it's thick enough for cooler temps. It's fashionable. It's a little bigger than I anticipated for a small... but perhaps it will shrink in the wash... not sure... haven't washed it yet...  Overall, I'm not disappointed with it. I can definitely get good use out of it.

评论概述: I have never had one of these jackets and this is my honest opinion!
评论详情: This is so freaking amazing! I always see these styles on athletes in movies and have always wanted one, but they're never in my size because I'm fat.  Let's talk about the pockets- they're relatively small, but they fit your fist nicely. They are back a bit on the sides of the jacket, but not at a place where it's awkward to have your hands in them.  The collar stays close to the neck, but it's not in a scratchy or uncomfortable way. I LOVE that the sleeves are cinchy and stay taught around my hands. It's really great when I pull them into my palm too, the way women tend to do, as a comfort thing. VERY relaxing.  The arms do get stiff as you cross them, as the material has no give. It's a VERY COMFY jacket, but it still warrants mentioning. The material is pretty stiff and stationary compared to most jackets. I believe it is because this jacket is made to a higher standard and at a higher caliber.  I got the black jacket with black sleeves- mostly because I can't trust myself with white clothes, I'm too accident-prone with food and dirty hands, etc... It is, for me, true to size, as well.  I really, really love this jacket and HIGHLY recommend. I like the show Teen Wolf, so I tell everyone the 'B' stands for Beacon Hills. After one wear, I got at least five compliments. REALLY NICE AND REALLY WORTH IT!  512 stars/ 5 :)

The COOFANDY Men's Varsity Jacket is a delightful addition to my wardrobe, courtesy of my thoughtful wife. This jacket has truly impressed me with its classic design, quality craftsmanship, and perfect fitment.  First and foremost, the design of this varsity jacket exudes a timeless appeal. The classic letterman style is a nod to the past, effortlessly blending vintage charm with contemporary fashion. It's a jacket that stands out without being overly flashy.  Quality is something that I hold in high regard when it comes to clothing, and this jacket does not disappoint. The craftsmanship is evident in the stitching, material selection, and overall construction. It seems well-made, assuring me of its long-lasting performance.  One of the standout features is the fitment. It's not always easy to find a jacket that fits just right, but this one does. It's clear that attention has been paid to the sizing and cut, resulting in a jacket that hugs the body comfortably without feeling restrictive.  In conclusion, this jacket has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. From its classic design to its quality craftsmanship and perfect fitment. If you're seeking a stylish and well-made addition to your wardrobe, I highly recommend this jacket.
Love this jacket. Very lightweight. Seems well put together. Looks really good in person.
Cool blazer for men, thick brass fabric, warm and cozy, easy to button, I think you should dry clean

This jacket is perfect to go out. The color is bright, and the quality of the fabric is perfect, super comfortable and soft. The buttons are large and easy to button. It has a moderate weight, and the interior is a mixture in normal fabric and polyester. It is quite warm a perfect product for personal use or a gift to a relative.

This jacket is my second COOFANDY brand order, and their pieces always catch my eye (long before I notice the name). Not only do they make visually appealing clothing, but the quality is fantastic! I have received fine materials, artisanship, cuts, stitching, and fabric. The aforementioned is vital, as, since the pandemic, I have found the condition of clothing I have purchased to be cheaper than ever, with defects aplenty, no matter how much I pay. I appreciate seeing brands not looking to cut corners but wanting to provide real-value products. If more companies and manufacturers subscribe to this basic philosophy, they will find they create lifetime customers. This jacket not only looks fantastic, it feels and fits incredible. The size I usually wear also seems spot-on with COOFANDY, making ordering simple. No one wants to return online clothing endlessly. Once I find a brand that is this consistent, I stick with them. This Varsity Jacket is a must-have piece to add to your clothing collection at the price point.

I’m a size 8 bottom, 6 on top woman. I ordered this jacket in the men’s medium. It fits exactly as I’d hoped! Nice and baggy and oversized. Perfect for fall over sweaters or thrown over a dress and sneakers. Looks super cool. Wish the arms were faux leather though. Lightweight, but just warm enough, especially if layered.
My nephew love it. Very good quality.
i like how it is packed and quality. there is no suture error.

评论概述: Eddie Murphy, eat your heart out…
评论详情: I bought this jacket to re-create Eddie Murphy’s iconic Beverly Hills Cop jacket from the movie. The colors are very very similar, and I was going to get some Detroit Lions patches and place them on the back and the sleeves to create a look-alike for a costume. The jacket is not as thick as a typical Letterman’s jacket. It’s still a nice jacket, just very thin. Also, I am 6’3” and 250 pounds and I normally wear an XL. I ordered a double XL to make sure I had plenty of room, and the jacket barely fits. It obviously run smaller than normal sizes. And no, I’m not falling for the banana in the tailpipe.

Value! I really like this jacket, really comfortable and fits me perfect. I was worried that it might run a little small or big, but they did excellent making this to fit to the size. Light weight makes it a perfect everyday jacket or if you want to go to some football games and the weather is a little chilly, this will keep you warm. The Letter is stitched on the front and the value is perfect. I highly recommend this product. 2 Thumbs up.

评论概述: I finally have my letter jacket
评论详情: I ordered this jacket in red because that was the color of the letter jackets at my high school. I lettered in football and baseball but I never got a letter jacket. Until now.  I also thought that the red might match up with the red of my favorite baseball team, the Boston Red Sox, and since the jacket has a letter B on it that is quite a bit like the Boston Red Sox letter B I thought this would be an ideal jacket for me.  The red on this jacket is lighter than the Boston Red Sox red, it almost has an orangish cast to it, if you know what I mean. But it is close enough to looking like a Red Sox jacket for me so I'm happy with it.  It is well made. It fits a bit more tightly than I expected, I ordered it in a fairly large size and I wish I had gotten even a size bigger because I would prefer some roominess in this type of jacket and I doubt it will stretch out very much. You might consider ordering one size larger than usual. Overall I'm satisfied with it. This will be perfect for autumn wear.

I wa expecting the blend of the material to just be on the sleeves, but it’s all over, which isn’t a bad thing.  It works because it doesn’t necessarily feel like a true bomber jacket, more like an actual letterman jacket.  It’s light enough to wear on a cooler night, but not so heavy that you have to wait for a cold night to cover yourself.  The design is simple, but bold, a couple of colors only that do the design nicely.  Definitely will be something I can wear with jeans or casual pants, and can stand out without being flashy.Recommended for sure, and at a very reasonable price.

This is a nice and cool looking jacket. It runs a little on the big side so keep that in mind when ordering. I really like it because it's soft and looks very stylish. I like the color coordination and it's easy to wear and match with different outfits. It comes in lots of different colors to choose from too. The buttons also button up nicely and is sewn well.

This varsity jacket is very well made…It looks exactly like the product pictures and true to size. The fabric is very soft and comfortable…It kinda have a good leather/velvet feelAlthough it’s for men, I intentionally ordered a smaller size so I can wear it myself and it fits pretty well. For reference, I’m 5’6 and 150lbs female and size S fit me well with some room left so it’s gonna be perfect for winter! Love the bright royal blue color!

评论概述: Very Nice Value Alternative for Bomber/Lettermen Jackets
评论详情: The COOFANDY Bomber Jacket is very comfortable, nice soft material, and fits as expected/shown with the bottom of the jacket just about at your belt line. The jacket is closed by metal snaps. The top snap pushes the jacket away from your chest a little so do not expect a snug to your throat fit.  I got the XL and as expected the arms were not long enough for me (I'm 6'6") but the XXL would have been too large around the waist per the sizing chart. Instead I gave it to my 6'2" daughter and it fit her arms just fine. I liked the color options and I ended up getting the Navy Blue jacket.  The only issue I have is that you can't change the letter on the chest. I'm sure that this was done to save time at the factory, but not everyone is going to want a jacket with a "B" on it. In fact, I bet there are very few.  The $39 purchase price was very economical for what you get.

Got this in my regualr 2xl and it fit very well, even a tad bit big. It’s nice and thick so im sure it’ll be a good jacket to use during the winter. It’s super comfortable on the inside. The pockets are a decent size but not huge. The buttons really snap into place and dont feel flimsy at all. The “B” is huge which is the only thing i didnt like about this jacket.
No cumple las receñas q todos ponen la calidad de la tela esta pecima para su precio esperaba algo muchísimo mejor por lo q pague y tan bn viene demaciado grande no recomiendo q la compren
